recipe.title: How to Make Pavlova
recipe.intro: Pavlova is a meringue dessert loved in Australia and New Zealand. It is crispy outside and soft inside, topped with cream and fruit.
recipe.ingredients: egg whites, caster sugar, white vinegar, cornflour, vanilla extract, whipped cream, fresh fruit (strawberries, kiwi, passionfruit)
steps: **Whisk** the egg whites in a clean bowl until stiff peaks form.
**Add** the caster sugar slowly, one spoon at a time, and keep **whisking**.
**Fold** in the vinegar, cornflour, and vanilla gently with a spatula.
**Shape** the meringue into a circle on baking paper and **bake** for 90 minutes.
**Top** the cooled pavlova with whipped cream and fresh fruit. **Serve** immediately!

review.text: I tried the pavlova at Reef Gateway CafÃ© yesterday. It was amazing! The meringue was crispy on the outside and marshmallow-soft on the inside. They put lots of fresh strawberries, kiwi, and passionfruit on top. The whipped cream was light and not too sweet. The portion was big enough to share with a friend. The cafÃ© is in the centre of Cairns, so it is easy to find. I really recommend this place for dessert lovers!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"The portion was big enough to share with a friend."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hello! Welcome to Reef Gateway CafÃ©. How are you today?

lines.speaker: Sophie
lines.text: I'm good, thanks! I heard your pavlova is really good.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, it is our most popular dessert! It is made fresh every day.

lines.speaker: Sophie
lines.text: That sounds lovely. What fruit is on top today?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Today we have strawberries, kiwi, and passionfruit.

lines.speaker: Sophie
lines.text: Perfect! I will have one, please. Can I also get a latte?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Great! That comes to fifteen dollars.

lines.speaker: Sophie
lines.text: Here you go. Can I sit on the terrace?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Sure! Take any seat you like outside. I will bring your order to you.

part_a.full_text: Are you coming to my birthday party on Saturday? Yes, of course! What are you making for dessert? I am going to make a pavlova. Wow, that is fancy! Can I bring anything? Can you bring some fresh fruit? Sure, I will get strawberries and kiwi. That would be great. The party starts at six o'clock. See you then!

I am going to make a

part_b.full_text: Good evening and welcome to Tropical Bites Restaurant. Let me tell you about our dessert menu tonight. We have three special desserts. First, our famous pavlova with mango and passionfruit. Second, a warm chocolate brownie with ice cream. Third, a coconut panna cotta. All desserts are twelve dollars each. If you order a dessert with a coffee, you get two dollars off. Our kitchen closes at nine thirty, so please order before then.

try_it.example: My favourite dessert is pavlova with strawberries. The meringue is crispy and sweet. I want to make one for my friends at the share house!
